parse.title: List of most visited museums by region

text.*:
See also: List of most visited museums and List of most visited art museums

This is a list of the top twenty most visited museums in each region, based upon the annual reports of museum attendance from the Art Newspaper Review and the Museum Index of the Themed Entertainment Association. Museums not on either list are not included.

Contents

  • 1 Europe
  • 2 North America
  • 3 Asia
  • 4 Australia and New Zealand
  • 5 South America
  • 6 Notes
  • 7 See also
  • 8 References

Europe[edit]

Europe - Top twenty Museums by number of visitors per year
Name Country flag, city Visitors per year Year reported
Louvre Paris 8,100,000 2017[1]
Vatican Museums Vatican City 6,427,000 2017[2]
British Museum London 5,906,716 2017[3]
Tate Modern London 5,656,004 2017[3]
National Gallery London 5,229,192 2017[3]
Natural History Museum London 4,434,520 2017[3]
State Hermitage Museum Saint Petersburg 4,200,000 2017[4]
Reina Sofía Madrid 3,880,812 2017[5]
Victoria and Albert Museum London 3,789,748 2017[3]
Centre Pompidou Paris 3,370,872 2017[6]
London Science Museum London 3,251,000 2017[3]
Somerset House London 3,223,350 2017[3]
Musée d'Orsay Paris 3,177,842 2017[7]
Museo del Prado Madrid 2,824,404 2017[8]
Royal Museums Greenwich London 2,607,099 2017[3]
Moscow Kremlin Museums Moscow 2,746,405 2017[9]
Van Gogh Museum Amsterdam 2,255,010 2017[10]
Galleria degli Uffizi Florence 2,235,355 2017[11]
Tretyakov Gallery Moscow 2,325,759 2017[12]
Rijksmuseum Amsterdam 2,160,000 2017[13]

Museum of Modern Art New York City 2,752,719 2017[23]
National Museum of African American History and Culture Washington, D.C. 2,400,000 2017[15][24]
National Museum of Anthropology Mexico City 2,336,115 2017[25]

National Museum of History Mexico City 2,135,465 2017[25]
California Science Center Los Angeles 2,106,000 2017[27]
Denver Museum of Nature and Science Denver 1,800,000 2017[28]
United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Washington, D.C. 1,700,000 2017[29]
Field Museum of Natural History Chicago 1,800,000 2017[30]
Art Institute of Chicago Chicago 1,619,316 2017[31]
Udvar-Hazy Center[32] Washington, D.C. 1,600,000 2017[33][34]
Getty Center Los Angeles 1,451,801 2017[35]
Royal Ontario Museum Toronto 1,389,696 2017[36]
Montreal Museum of Fine Arts Montreal 1,323,837 2017[37]

Asia - Top twenty museums by number of visitors per year
Name City Visitors annually Year reported
National Museum of China Beijing 8,062,625 2017[38][39]
Shanghai Science and Technology Museum Shanghai 6,421,000 2017[40]
National Palace Museum[iii] Taipei 4,436,118 2017[41][42]
China Science and Technology Museum Beijing 3,983,000 2017[43]
Zhejiang Provincial Museum Hangzhou 3,670,000 2017[44]
National Museum of Korea Seoul 3,476,606 2017[45]
Gansu Provincial Museum Lanzhou 3,300,000 2017[46]
Nanjing Museum Nanjing 3,300,000 2017[47]
National Museum of Natural Science Taichung 3,115,000 2017[48]
Chengdu Museum Chengdu 3,000,000 2017[49]
National Art Center Tokyo 2,987,000 2017[50][51]
National Science Education Center Taipei 2,869,000 2017[52]
Tokyo Metropolitan Art Museum Tokyo 2,723,955 2017[53]
Shaanxi History Museum Xi'an 2,700,000 2017[54]
National Museum of Nature and Science Tokyo 2,600,000 2017[55]

Shanghai Museum Shanghai 2,109,200 2017[58][59]
Three Gorges Museum Chongqing 2,112,000 2017[60][61]
National Science and Technology Museum Kaohsiung 1,981,000 2017[62]
National Folk Museum of Korea Seoul 1,813,626 2017[63]

Australia and New Zealand[edit]

Australia and New Zealand
Name Country flag, city Visitors per year Year reported
National Gallery of Victoria Melbourne 2,810,696 2017[64]
Queensland Gallery of Modern Art Brisbane 1,425,826 2017[65]
Art Gallery of New South Wales Sydney 1,349,000 2017[66]
Australian Centre for the Moving Image Melbourne 1,316,000 2016[67]
Museum of Contemporary Art Australia Sydney 1,206,000 2017[68]
National Gallery of Australia Canberra 782,828 2017[69]

South America[edit]

South America
Name Country flag, city Visitors per year Year reported
Centro Cultural Banco do Brasil Rio de Janeiro 1,337,566 2017[70]
Centro Cultural Banco do Brasil Brasília 1,229,432 2017[71]
Museu Nacional da Republica Brasilia 935,168 2017[72]
Instituto Tomie Otake Sao Paolo 895,769 2017[73]

Notes[edit]

− ^i Includes visitors recorded at all three Metropolitan Museum of Art sites, such as the 505,590 visitors recorded at the Met Breuer.
+

− +

^iii Includes only the visitors recorded at the main museum in Taipei, and not the 991,666 visitors recorded at the Southern Branch.

^iii Includes only the visitors recorded at the main museum in Taipei, and not the visitors recorded at the Southern Branch.
− ^iv Includes the Canadian Museum of History and the Canadian War Museum.

−


− ^vi |}
